attributes.action: Complete what the British public voted for and leave EU.NOW
attributes.additional_details: MPs and the Labour and SNP parties have voted against any proposals put forward, that are trying to hijack democracy, we need to make sure this doesn't happen.
attributes.background: A democratic vote has been held, and the majority was to leave the EU, remainer MPs and opposition parties have tried to hijack a democratic vote they did not like, they have tried to stop brexit at any cost, we need to make sure democracy wins.
